application.name: vimsdbgen
application.brief: Outputs a PVL file that contains camera infomation.
application.description: This program requires the user supply a "level 1" cube. That is, a cube in raw camera geometry. The user can choose to run spiceinit on the input cube. Spiceinit will use the system kernels, so any user updates to SPICE information will be lost. The default is to not run spiceinit. This program will output various spacecraft and insrument related information. Some of the output information will be a compilation of all bands, this will be put in the "Common" object of the PVL. Other infomation will be for a given band and placed in the "BandSet" object. the user can use the "output options" check boxes to control the infomation that will be output to the PVL. if the polygon option is chosen, the image polygon is output in well known text format. The following is an example of the output given when vimsdbgen is ran:

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: This is the name of a single ISIS Cassini VIMS image cube that will be added to database. It is optional and useful for processing single files, one at a time. It is intended to be used to selectively update cubes.

parameter.name: FROMLIST
parameter.brief: Name of file containing list of Cassini VIMS ISIS cubes
parameter.description: This file contains a list of Cassini VIMS ISIS cube files that will be processed and added to the database file. It can be used in addition to the FROM parameter.

parameter.name: CONFIG
parameter.brief: Input PVL file containing processing parameters
parameter.description: This file contains parameters that will be used to specify or constrain processing of input files. The target, number of bands expected/required, and geometric constraints will be used from this file.

parameter.name: DBCONFIG
parameter.brief: Input existing VIMS database file to add to

description.p: This file contains the specification of a PostgreSQL/Postgis database where the data will be written.

parameter.name: PROFILE
parameter.brief: Name of database profile to use
parameter.description: Name of specific Profile group to use for publication purposes of the result. Support may vary put it is currently expected to be a PostgreSQL/Postgis database access profile that specifies login information to the database.

parameter.name: ERRLOG
parameter.description: This file will contain a detailed listing of errors that occured and any specific error messages for each category of errors. This can be useful to get the description of the errors and individual specific GIS GEOS exceptions.
